fields.Title: HQ / EXIT BULLET difficult
fields.Description: The bullet you find in the shack, hinting that someone else has been staying here. Secretly.

fields.Title: You: "This bullet isn't for a breechloade..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This bullet isn't for a breechloader like the murder weapon?

fields.Title: You: ""What do you think it's doing here?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do you think it's doing here?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's a big leap, but from what I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's a big leap, but from what I've heard, this Ruby sounds pretty desperate. Either way," he looks at the bullet again, "this is enough to confront the washerwoman."

fields.Title: Loose Floorboard: "You return the board to its origina..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You return the board to its original position.

fields.Title: You: "What is it?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What is it?

fields.Title: Loose Floorboard: "A small cylindrical object. You pul..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A small cylindrical object. You pull it out -- a bullet.

fields.Title: You: ""Possibly.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Possibly."

fields.Title: Empathy: "Holding the bullet, you get the fee..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Holding the bullet, you get the feeling -- this isn't ammunition against you. It's for herself.

fields.Title: You: ""I think this is a last resort -- a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think this is a last resort -- a bullet in case suicide becomes an option."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Either way," he looks at the bulle..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Either way," he looks at the bullet again, "this is enough to confront her with."

fields.Title: Loose Floorboard: "As you look at the floorboards in t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As you look at the floorboards in this corner of the shack, it's clear one of them isn't quite level with the others.

fields.Title: Empathy: "Think what you want, but, in your g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Think what you want, but, in your gut, you know otherwise.

fields.Title: Loose Floorboard: "The floorboard isn't interested --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The floorboard isn't interested -- maybe the Washerwoman is? You have enough to confront her with.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "A 9mm bullet to be exact. Fit for a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A 9mm bullet to be exact. Fit for all muzzleloaders of that calibre.

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "It's extra ammunition. She's locked..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's extra ammunition. She's locked and loaded, ready to fight some cops.

fields.Title: Empathy: "Holding the bullet, you get the fee..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Holding the bullet, you get the feeling -- this isn't ammunition against *you*. It's for herself.

fields.Title: Loose Floorboard: "The floorboard doesn't care -- but..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The floorboard doesn't care -- but maybe the Washerwoman does? You have enough to confront her with.

fields.Title: You: ""Kim, I think this is extra ammunit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kim, I think this is extra ammunition against us."

fields.Title: You: "Search through the sand and sawdust..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Search through the sand and sawdust.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, for muzzleloaders like the on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, for muzzleloaders like the ones officers of the RCM carry. Interesting."

fields.Title: You: "Seems to me like someone is armed a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Seems to me like someone is armed and waiting for us.

fields.Title: Loose Floorboard: "The hollow space underneath the flo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The hollow space underneath the floorboards is dark and damp. You can barely make out the mixture of sand and sawdust below.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Someone hid it as extra ammunition?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Someone hid it as extra ammunition?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant studies the bullet i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant studies the bullet in your hand. "Still, interesting."

fields.Title: You: ""Ruby?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ruby?"

fields.Title: You: "Move the board aside."
fields.Dialogue Text: Move the board aside.

fields.Title: You: ""Look, a bullet! Not for a breechlo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Look, a bullet! Not for a breechloader, though..."

fields.Title: You: ""Lieutenant, a bullet!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lieutenant, a bullet!"

fields.Title: You: "Oh, I don't want to stick my hand i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh, I don't want to stick my hand in there. [Leave.]

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's something of a leap -- but..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's something of a leap -- but we should be on our guard. Either way," he looks at the bullet again, "this is enough to confront the washerwoman."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""See anything interesting?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "See anything interesting?"

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "The edge of a floorboard next to it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The edge of a floorboard next to it looks scratched.

fields.Title: Loose Floorboard: "You stick your hand in and start co..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You stick your hand in and start combing through the sand. Dry, not like outside. Fine dust... and then -- something hard, wrapped in paper.

fields.Title: You: "It's nothing. [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: It's nothing. [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: "A bullet, interesting."
fields.Dialogue Text: A bullet, interesting.

fields.Title: You: ""Let's go, then." [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's go, then." [Leave.]

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "A 9mm bullet to be exact. Fit for a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A 9mm bullet to be exact. Fit for all muzzleloaders of that calibre, like your own Villiers pistol, for example.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant nods."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant nods.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't know, could be. The washer..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know, could be. The washerwoman was clearly withholding something -- and she *does* rent this place out to people."

fields.Title: Loose Floorboard: "Nothing particular catches your eye..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nothing particular catches your eye. Looks like more reeds. There might be something hidden inside the sand, though.

fields.Title: Loose Floorboard: "In time, dust will settle upon the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In time, dust will settle upon the wooden boards, covering up all tracks.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Something bad. Someone's night thou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Something bad. Someone's night thoughts. A last resort. A bad idea.

fields.Title: You: "What's in here?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What's in here?
